features: [CALM, SOOTHE, COMFORTABLE SKIN] Mediheal offers 22 times increased Tea Tree Extract to help restore skin balance and provide soothing care in Teatree Essential mask. Madecassoside treats blemish, breakouts, offer intensely clearing up blemishes and soothing troubled skin. Clinically proven to improve cell turnover and pigmentation.

[TIGHTENING, DEWY, NOURISH] Mediheal's best selling Collagen is offered 3 times more in Collagen Essential mask. Intensely tighten and firm the skin to create healthy looking skin, visibly plumps and help restore skin elasticity. Placenta Essential mask offers intensely leaving skin velvety soft and smooth.

[BRIGHTEN UP, RADIANT, EXTRA HYDRATE] Vita Essential offers intensely brightening and toning up effect for more lively skin. It contains mild multi-vitamin to improve complexion and achieve refreshing finish. Watermide Essential mask locks in moisture and retains abundant moisture to deliver and Niacinamide refines skin texture and brighten up the skin.

Transform your skincare routine with our SKINCARE ESSENTIALS - a collection of rejuvenating facial sheet masks expertly formulated to brighten, hydrate, calm, and moisturize all skin types. Whether you're dealing with dry, oily, or sensitive skin, our assortment of treatments is carefully curated to enhance your natural glow and leave your skin looking and feeling radiant. Elevate your daily beauty ritual with the best skincare essentials on the market!

Indulge in the ultimate beauty experience with our BEAUTY GIFT SKINCARE SET - an exquisite collection of Korean sheet masks specially crafted to cater to every skin type and concern. Whether you're shopping for women, men, teens, girls, or boys, this skincare gift set is the perfect addition to your gift ideas list for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, and special occasions. Get ready to pamper your skin with the best gift ever!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MEDIHEAL ESSENTIAL HEROES Mediheal must-haves for sheet mask beginners and experts alike.

WHAT'S INCLUDED FIRM, PLUMP AND RESTORE SKIN Collagen Essential Mask Collagen Active 3X Complex Firms, visibly plumps for younger looking skin SOOTHE IRRITATED SKIN AND IMPROVE SKIN BALANCE Teatree Essential Mask Tea Tree Active 3X Complex Intensely calms and soothes for blemish-free skin HYDRATE Watermide Essential Mask Water 3X Complex Deeply hydrates and gives skin an instant glow for soft, smooth, de-stressed skin

TONE AND ADD RADIANCE Vita Essential Mask Vita Active 3X Complex Instantly adds luminosity to skin for a looking complexion TREAT BLEMISHES AND POST-BLEMISH MARKS Madecassoside Essential Mask Cica 3X Complex Proven to improve cell turnover for clear, even looking skin VEGAN CERTIFIED SHEET This VEGAN certified sheet is silky soft and firmly hugs skin for optimal absorption of our powerful essence.Enhanced mask shape comfortably fits all face shapes.Tested and safe for sensitive skin.

Mediheal's Sustainable Cartons FSC CERTIFIED + SOY INK PRINTED CARTONS MEDIHEAL uses sustainable packaging certified to meet the environmental and social standards for FSC and print with soy-based ink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely for your skin!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been an avid face mask user for years and these see the best I have ever tried! Thanks to tiktok my skin feels so rejuvenated. The masks really do what they say. It’s a plus that’s it’s a korean brand because as far as I know they are always top quality with skincare products. Im getting more for myself & as gifts this holiday season!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some of the best sheet masks out there!
reviews.reviewText: As an esthetician, these sheet masks are honestly great!! They have different ones for different treatments and each one (I personally feel) does what it is meant to do! I fell in love with all of them and they are all hydrating and amazing in their own way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good trial set for MEDIHEAL masks.
reviews.reviewText: I heard so many things about Mediheal sheet masks and their number 1 popular sheet mask brand and their just notorious for them so I was itching to try it out! I just know their good.Since it's my first time trying them out, I wanted a lot of them so thankfully they have a variety multi pack!This is great to gift to anyone who enjoys using them. I've used a couple and their super moisturizing!! I like using these for 30 minutes since their just so much essence. It's super relaxing to have it on and chill.I personally like to just put the mask after use into a used up moisturizer tub and just take it out and use the left over essence on my face and neck until it's used up. I just squeeze it into my palms. It's frugal but I'm making sure I get every last drop of it.Overall, I love this! having the multi-pack is fun since I can try them all out~~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice face sheets
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the products. I especially love the ultrahydrating sheet mask. They are luxurious. They leave my skin feeling hydrated and clean. There is a very faint scent. Great quality masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got it on deal for Black Friday
reviews.reviewText: Really moisturizing and refreshing for the skin … good for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: So far these face masks have been great . My only complain is that the contents are super juicy making it messy to handle but other than that they’ve been Great no problems so far. I’ve only tried 3 of 6.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve enjoyed these. They are very moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Many for the price!
reviews.reviewText: These work good! You get a lot in a pack and different kinds of mask. Would buy again
